Edushifts On Tour

Presente

EDUshifts
OnTour
Executive 2018
Brasil

Ready to step out
of our reality?

Our society is undergoing an intense transformation. A growing number of citizens is challenging the status quo and adopting sustainable ways of living, working and learning.

We invite conscious decision makers and enablers to explore and suppoort cutting edge solutions while experiencing the dynamic ecosystem of Brazil. EDUshiftsOnTour Executive - this journey will transform the way you collaborate and create impact.

What is in there for you ?

STEP OUT of your demanding environment. Are you chasing a new world while being caught in old paradigms and minsets? Learn how to create impact beyond traditional paths and investments.

EXPERIENCE how to set up exponetial projects while taking care of your personal needs. Learn to use your superpowers and adapt to a new reality.

COLABORATE with a new generation of thought leaders and upcoming game changers. Follow your call and enjoy heartful and mindful relationships to yourself and people around you!

GET TO KNOW Social Innovation projects and inspiring learning communities in two contrasting hotspots: the "Valley Wisdowm" Alto Paraiso and metropolitan São Paulo. The future is now!

INFORMATION & DETAILS

Dates: 10 days in the first half of 2018. We invite a small group of 9 people. Once we have the right participants. we will find together a convenient date. Locations: Alto Paraíso and São Paulo.

Your investment EUR 7.599 - EUR 9.599.* Included in this lifetime adventure: - Accommodation, Breakfast and Dinner, local transportation in Brazil for all group activities. Not included : flights to Brazil. - Curated impact journey & deep personal learning experience. Topics: Transformation in Education. Social Innovation and Community building.

We use a Pay-it-Forward and Solidarity Economy Model for promising talents and social entrepreneurs will join the tour.

Ready for an Adventure of a lifetime ?

Find out this experience is a food fit for you. Reach out for Phillipe Greier philippe@present-e.org

WHAT IS OUR MISSION ?

We will create a documentary about the transformation in education in our society. Brazil has been a melting Pot for social movements and Progressive education.

Join us and create a new reality. Let's tell a different story full of hope inspiring while setting up the foundation for a global movement!

Who We Are?

Present is a non-profit foundation committed empower our society for a conscious evolution. Since 2011 we have been running EDUshiftsOnTour in multiple regions: Europe, Midddle East and South America. More information at

www.present-e.org

Get to know our team

Philippe Greier 

Philippe is founder of the NGO presente! and initiator of several successful prototypes and solutions for transforming education in a collaborative ways. A professional hippie who envisions a future built upon tolerance and conscious choices. What triggers him is discovering and experimenting new realities and ways to live together and to collaborate in save and abundant communities.

Thais Avelino

Graduated in information systems and passionate about education. Was director of educational projects at Ganbatte (education and social impact startup), collaborating in the use of technology to improve the students' experience. Tied in the area of ​​technology, in multinational and startups, also collaborating with projects of educational technology. Now have been looking for ways to transform projects through new economies and live in France, studying AI programming at Ecole 42, an innovative educational project without teachers based on self-managed and peer-2-peer learning.

Sarah Morais

Brazilian, passionate about democratic education and ballet dancer. I'm master's student in International Educational Development at Teachers College Columbia University. My focus is school leadership development and I'm writing about the creation of a school principals' network in Brazil for school change. I got a Bachelor in Business from FEA-USP with an exchange program at InHolland University. I discovered my motivation to work with education through Cidadao Pro-Mundo (CPM), a NGO that promotes English teaching through volunteering in Sao Paulo and Rio de Janeiro. Current board member, I was the first manager and responsible for the NGO's professionalization. I have previous experience with project management in the innovation industry and corporate social investment. Before I came to study in NY I was consultant at Instituto Tellus, leading a project with innovative public schools in Brazil - that's why I'm passionate about democratic education!

Giulio Lazaretti Christiansen

Multimedia designer, photographer and videomaker based in São Paulo city. Former student of Agronomic Engineering (ESALQ/USP), felt he could be of greater use within the realm of artistic expression. Nevertheless, is to this day still deeply connected to agriculture, nutrition, territory and the Slow Food movement. Once upon a time built a house in Minas Gerais to raise his daughter away from the big city, but came back to plan on that transition better. Motion graphics, 3D, animation, illustration, layouts, infographics, filming, editing, scripting, you name it. How may I help?
